2023.title: ChatGPT iOS & Android apps launch
2023.description: OpenAI released official ChatGPT apps—iOS in May and Android in July—enabling on‑the‑go access, assistant integration, and default‑app options on mobile devices.

2023.title: ChatGPT hits 100 M weekly users
2023.description: By late 2023, ChatGPT had over 100 million weekly active users, making it the fastest‑growing consumer app ever and solidifying generative AI’s mainstream presence.

2023.title: GPT‑4 Turbo & GPT‑4V unveiled at OpenAI DevDay
2023.description: At its first DevDay in Nov 2023, OpenAI introduced GPT‑4 Turbo (faster, cheaper) and GPT‑4V (with vision capabilities) alongside user‑customizable “GPTs”.

2023.title: Google launches Bard and Gemini announced
2023.description: February saw Bard roll out as OpenAI’s ChatGPT rival; in May, Google DeepMind revealed Gemini—a multimodal model handling text, images, audio, and video.

2023.title: AutoGPT released
2023.description: On March 30, AutoGPT—an open‑source autonomous “AI agent” capable of task planning and self‑execution—was released, igniting the agentic AI movement.

2023.title: Huawei launches PanGu‑Σ & PanGu 3.0
2023.description: In July, Huawei unveiled PanGu‑Σ (1.085 trillion parameters) and PanGu 3.0 for enterprise use, along with smart assistant Celia on HarmonyOS devices.

2023.title: Adobe Firefly beta launch
2023.description: Adobe opened Firefly’s generative AI image‑and‑video capabilities in public beta (March), followed by an enterprise release in June integrated into Creative Cloud.

2023.title: Mistral AI founded
2023.description: In April, Mistral AI—an open‑weight LLM startup from France—founded, rapidly gaining attention for its mixture‑of‑expert model architecture.

2023.title: Microsoft invests $10 B in OpenAI
2023.description: Microsoft announced a record $10 billion investment in OpenAI, deepening their partnership and embedding AI across Microsoft’s cloud and app ecosystem.

2023.title: ElevenLabs beta text‑to‑speech
2023.description: ElevenLabs launched its next-generation TTS beta in 2023, offering highly expressive, humanlike voice synthesis tuned for narration and dialogue.

2023.title: Instruct Pix2Pix open‑source
2023.description: The Instruct Pix2Pix model, enabling guided image edits via textual instructions, was released open-source in 2023.

2023.title: Midjourney v5 and ControlNet
2023.description: Midjourney v5 improved ultra‑realistic image generation; ControlNet enabled fine‑pose and layout control in generated visuals.

2023.title: NVIDIA reaches $1T valuation
2023.description: Nvidia’s market value surpassed $1 trillion in 2023, propelled by surging demand for its AI GPUs powering LLM training and inference.

2023.title: Generative AI governance & policy push
2023.description: 2023 saw major policy activity: EU AI Act progressed; U.S. Executive Order set guardrails; and ~100 AI leaders signed a global AI safety statement.

2023.title: Multimodal & Constitutional AI
2023.description: Advances included multimodal models like GPT‑4V and Gemini, and Constitutional AI from Anthropic—embedding value‑aligned principles for safer outputs.
